name: Crybaby-GMTK
description:
Crybaby is an entry into GMTKJam 2020.

You wake up in an abandoned hospital next to a screaming baby. 

Murderous robots are everywhere. 

Robots hate screaming babies.

They don't like you much, either.

Can you keep the baby under control as you use the environment to evade enemies and escape?

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to look

E to open/close doors

LMB/RMB to pick up/put down baby

Hold Space to soothe the crying baby.

Press Esc if the robots are too scary.
